name: Square Wars (Phoenix Studios)
description:
Square Wars is an arcade style shooter, similar to Defender. You move up and down, dodging asteroids and shooting aliens.

Dodging a column is worth 2 point, and shooting an alien gets you a bonus 2 points.

And may the square be with you!

Controls:

Move Up - W or Up Arrow

Move Down - S or Down Arrow

Shoot - Space
